oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Artist in Residence - Earl Scruggs - 2004-09-07 - set one
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: First of four Artist in Residence performances by Earl Scruggs from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on September 9, 2004. Set one of two. Special guests include Gary Scruggs, John Jorgenson, Bryan Sutton, Jon Randall, Rob Ickes, Glen Duncan.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Earl Scruggs; Gary Scruggs; John Jorgenson; Bryan Sutton; Jon Randall; John Gardner; Rob Ickes; Glen Duncan;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Recording begins in progress. Introduction by Kyle Young. Salty Dog Blues (Gary Scruggs-vocal) -- Long Black Veil (Gary Scruggs-vocal) -- Borrowed Love (Jon Randall-vocal) -- Earl's Breakdown -- Ashes Of Love ( John Jorgenson-vocal) - In The Pines (unannounced vocalist) -- You Ain't Goin' Nowhere (Gary Scruggs-vocal) -- Doin' My Time (Unannounced vocalist) -- We'll Meet Again Sweetheart (Jon Randall-vocal) -- Foggy Mountain Rock -- John Hardy Was A Desperate Little Man (Bryan Sutton-vocal) -- Soldier's Joy -- Intermission.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Scruggs, Earl; Scruggs, Gary; Jorgenson, John; Sutton, Bryan; Stewart, Jon Randall; Gardner, John; Duncan, Glen; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
